definition.achievementDescription: §dUltimate (Ability 3) - All your Fortune is discharged as hazard in entities. The more Fortune, the stronger and farther the Hazard goes. (Requires at least Fortune IV Effect. Cooldowns all your abilities for 3 days and this one from 6)
